name: POKCLICK
description:
POKCLICK

▪️ This is my pokemon clicker game.

✅ Objectives: Get different pokemon species to give you  automatic money, buy different pokeballs for more money for clicks.

▪️ That's all for this release game, the rest of things discover them on your own enjoying the game

;) Tip: click the pikachu when it comes out of the pokeball ( 50 coins )

By MalvaDiscosMeme
